TEXT: You awaken, face down, in an unfamiliar setting. NL At least you have your pants this time.
Kerthwack or something, ig. Right, time for a barbeque.

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, you get an all too familiar feeling. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~hooded~ ~one,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
